name: Divine Heavenscale Lee Sin
description: All hail the Prince of Dragons, heir to the throne of the heavenly Kingdom of Dragons! A noble and just prince, Lee Sin is deeply devoted to his people. When he hears the telltale crackle of fireworks just below the clouds, he knows it's time to learn more about his human subjects—and how they greet the New Year with a bang!

wikiSkinData.distribution: 1% drop rate from Divine 2024 Capsules or opening 30 Divine 2024 Capsules
